class.name: com.cardiodx.db.waban.audit.AudOrganization
class.comment: Audit of information about organizations external to the lab.

column.name: CHANGE_REASON_ID
column.comment: Foreign key to the reason for change in change_reason table

column.name: ORGANIZATION_ID
column.comment: Sponsor company identifier.

column.name: COMPANY
column.comment: The sponsor company's name.

column.name: ORGANIZATION_TYPE
column.comment: Type of organization record

column.name: ADDRESS1
column.comment: The first line of the sponsor company's (street) address.

column.name: ADDRESS2
column.comment: The second line of the sponsor company's (street) address.

column.name: CITY
column.comment: The sponsor company's city.

column.name: STATE
column.comment: The sponsor company's state.

column.name: ZIP_CODE
column.comment: The sponsor company's zip code.

column.name: COUNTRY
column.comment: The sponsor company's country.

column.name: CONTACT
column.comment: The name of the individual to contact at this company.

column.name: EMAIL
column.comment: The email address of the vendor or contact.

column.name: PHONE
column.comment: The sponsor company's full phone number.

column.name: FAX
column.comment: The sponsor company's full fax number.

column.name: COMMENTS
column.comment: Text comments about the vendor or contact.

column.name: CREATED_BY
column.comment: User who created the record.

column.name: DATE_CREATED
column.comment: Date the record was created.

column.name: MODIFIED_BY
column.comment: User who last modified the record.

column.name: DATE_MODIFIED
column.comment: Date the record was last modified.

column.name: CHANGED_BY
column.comment: User who caused this audit transaction to take place.

column.name: DATE_CHANGED
column.comment: Date this audit transaction took place.

column.name: CHANGE_TYPE
column.comment: Activity that triggered this audit transaction (mod or del).
